Old Way022132jj7fdp2pbwdfd9a5m1vd59wkmo77xgq1221332014-04-01T20:44:25ZGonzalo848331{{Disambig}}

'''Old Way''' can refer to:

* '''[[Old Way (First Men)]]''': the traditions and codes of the [[First Men]], still practiced by the [[Northmen|people]] of [[the North]] of [[Westeros]].
* '''[[Old Way (Ironborn)]]''': the traditional lifestyle of [[Raiding|reaving and plundering]] practiced by the [[Ironborn]] and consecrated in the religion of the [[Drowned God]].
